title: S13 Ep135: Theater of the Mind
itunes:title: Theater of the Mind
description:
You Asked for IT, YOU got it! A Very Special episode of BEYOND the DARKNESS
Still trying to get through your food coma? Dave & Tim deliver up a heaping helping of pure entertainment value today with a Theater of the Mind cornucopia of creepy fun!

Listeners have been asking for an easier way to hear our Theater of the Mind segments so as a way of showing Thanks for all of you, here are some of the most popular and most requested episodes over the past 2 years.
Sit back, relax, turn down the lights and turn up the show and enjoy these frightening, fun and fascinating real tales from listeners.
